name: Ludum-dare-31
body:
### Welcome to Ludum Dare 31!

Topic for this Jam is **_"Entire Game in one Screen"_**.

### Used Tools
#### Programming
* Phaser Javascript Game Framework
* Atom Editor
* Yeoman Phaser Browserify Generator
* Terminal :)

#### Sound
* Autotracker

#### Graphics
* Pixen Editor

### Ideas
* Space / Sci-fi stuff
* Simulation / Management thing
* FIREFLY! (just because i watched it recently and love it)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
